sections.title: 2.\bOn\bthe\bnature\bof\b\fepen\fency\brelations\b
paragraphs: Theoretical"b linguistic"b studies"b show"b that"b the"b nature"b and"b di"fersity"b of"b dependency"b relations"b that"b hold"b between"b lexical"b units"b in"b a"b sentence"b are"b not"b language-independent."b Rather,"b quite"b often,"b a"b language"b or"b a"b group"b of"b languages"b re"feal"b some"b peculiarities"b that"b require"b the"b introduction"b of"b specific"b tags."b For"b instance,"b in"b Catalan,"b Galician"b and"b Italian,"bthe"barticle"bcombines"bwith"bthe"bpossessi"fe"bpronoun:"b Cat."bla me\ba ma\te,"b lit."b ‘the"b my"b mother’"b "fs."b Gal."ba miña \fai"b"fs."bIt."bla mia mad\te,"bwhile"bin"bSpanish,"bFrench,"betc."bit"b does"bnot:"bSp."b*la mi mad\te,"bFr."b*la ma mè\te. In"bprinciple,"b if"b they"b combine,"b both"b the"b article"b and"b possessi"fe"b pronoun"b could"b be"b considered"b determiners"b (as,"b in"b fact,"b does"bPDT)."b Howe"fer,"b this"b would"b not"b capture"b their"b idiosyncrasy"bwith"b respect"b to"b repetition"b (only"b one"b article"b per"b NP"b is"b admissible,"bwhile"bse"feral"bpossessi"fe"bpronouns"bcan"boccur)"b and"border"b(they"bcannot"bbe"bpermutated)."b"b In"ba"bseries"bof"bmultilingual"bdependency"btreebanks,"bthe"bsame"b dependency"brelation"btag"bset"bis"bused"bfor"beach"blanguage."bIt"bis"b the"bcase,"bfor"binstance,"bin"bthe"bAnCora"bdependency"btreebank"b released"bin"bthree"blanguages,"bnamely"bSpanish,"bBasque"band"b Catalan,"b and"b in"b the"b Swedish-Turkish"b parallel"b treebank"b (Megyesi"bet al.,"b 2008)."b In"b general,"b for"b all"b parallel"b treebanks"bthat"bwe"bcould"binspect"b–"bPDT2.0-PDAT"b(Hajič"bet al.,"b 2006,"b 2004),"b PCET"b (Čmejrek"bet al.,"b 2004),"b FuSe"b (Cyrus"bet al.,"b2003),"bLinEs"b(Ahrenberg,"b2007),"betc."b–,"bthe"b justification"bof"bthe"bchoice"bof"bdependency"blabels"bis"bfar"bfrom"b being"bcentral"bor"bis"be"fen"blargely"ba"foided."bIn"bour"bwork,"bwe"b found"b this"b question"b "fery"b crucial."b Thus,"b we"b obser"fed"b that"b the"b choice"b of"b tags"b "faries"b across"b languages"b (in"b the"bsense"b that"b distinct"b tags"b are"b required"b for"b distinct"b languages)"b and"b across"b applications"b (in"b the"b sense"b that"b depending"b on"b the"b application,"b a"b tag"b set"b needs"b to"b be"b more"b or"b less"b finegrained)."b Thus,"b in"b the"b framework"b of"b corpus-based"b text"b generation,"b it"b is"b essential"b to"b capture"b such"b idiosyncratic"b dependencies"b as"b discussed"b abo"fe"b for"b Catalan,"b Galician"b and"b Italian,"b while"b in"b the"b framework"b of"b corpus-based"b parsing"b technologies,"b often"b more"b generic"b (and"b thus"b smaller)"bdependency"btag"bsets"bare"bpreferred."b

Ideally,"b a"b dependency"b relation"b annotation"b schema"b would,"b on"bthe"bone"bhand,"bfacilitate"bthe"bannotation"bof"ball"blanguagespecific"b syntactic"b idiosyncrasies,"b but,"b on"b the"b other"b hand,"b also"boffer"ba"bmoti"fated"bgeneralization"bof"bthe"btags"bsuch"bthat"b it"b could"b also"b ser"fe"b for"b applications"b that"b prefer"b small"b generic"b dependency"b tag"b sets."b In"b the"b next"b section,"b we"b present"b the"b proposal"b for"b such"b a"b schema."b The"b proposal"b is"b based"b on"b our"b work"b on"b Spanish,"b with"b an"b occasional"b contrasti"fe"b look"b at"b Catalan,"b English,"b Finnish,"b Galician,"b and"bSwedish."b"b

sections.title: 6.\bConclusions\b
paragraphs: We"b propose"b a"b hierarchical"b dependency"b structure"b annotation"b schema"b that"b is"b more"b detailed"b and"b more"b flexible"b than"b the"b known"b state-of-the-art"b annotation"b schemata."b The"b presented"b schema"b allows"b us"b to"b choose"b the"b le"fel"b of"b the"b desired"b detail"b of"b the"b annotation"b and"b to"b adapt"b it"b easily"b to"b new"b syntactic"b phenomena."b Thanks"bto"b the"b inclusion"b of"b semantico-syntactic"b tags,"b we"b can"b annotate"b a"b corpus"b not"b only"b with"b syntactic"b information,"b but"b also"b with"b "falency"b information"b for"b all"b "falencybearing"blexemes"b("ferbs"band"bnouns,"band"badjecti"fes)"bas"bit"b is"busually"bfound"bin"bseparate"btreebanks"bsuch"bas"bPropBank"b "b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"e"b"b"b"b "b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b"b 10 "b This"b list"b of"b attributes"b corresponds"b to"b the"b “syntactic"b combinatorial"b zone”"b of"b a"b lexical"b entry"b as"b described"b in"b (Mel’čuk, 2006):"b and"b NomBank."b Furthermore,"b this"b annotation"b schema"b facilitates"b the"b deri"fation"b of"b deeper"b annotations,"b leading"b to"btruly"bmultile"fel"bannotated"bdependency"bcorpora."b"b
